Package imusim :: Package maths :: Module kalman :: Class UnscentedKalmanFilter

Class UnscentedKalmanFilter

source code

Implementation of the unscented Kalman filter algorithm for additive noise.

Implementation equations are taken from Wan and Van Der Merwe, "The Unscented Kalman Filter", table 7.3.2.

Method Details

__init__(self, stateUpdateFunction, measurementFunction, state, stateCovariance, processCovariance, measurementCovariance)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct unscented Kalman filter.

Parameters:
  • stateUpdateFunction - Non-linear function to propagate state into the next timestep. The function is called with two arguments, the current Nx1 state vector and the current Mx1 control input vector. It should return a new Nx1 state vector. N and M are the numbers of states and control inputs.
  • measurementFunction - Non-linear function relating state variables to expected measurements. The function is called with the current Nx1 state vector as an argument, and should return an Mx1 measurement vector. N and M are the numbers of states and measurement outputs.
  • state - Initial state estimate.
  • stateCovariance - Initial state covariance matrix.
  • processCovariance - Process noise covariance matrix.
  • measurementCovariance - Measurement noise covariance matrix.
Overrides: object.__init__

predict(self, control=None)

source code 

Predict the system state at the next timestep, updating the estimate.

Parameters:
  • control - Mx1 np.ndarray of control inputs, or None if there are no control inputs to the system.
Overrides: KalmanFilter.predict
(inherited documentation)

innovation(self, measurement)

source code 

Calculate the filter innovation and covariance for a given measurement.

Parameters:
  • measurement - Nx1 np.ndarray of measurement inputs.
Returns:
Nx1 innovation vector, NxN covariance matrix of the innovation, and MxN cross covariance from states to measurements.
Overrides: KalmanFilter.innovation
(inherited documentation)

correct(self, measurement)

source code 

Correct the filter state given a new measurement.

Parameters:
  • measurement - Nx1 np.ndarray of measurement inputs.
Overrides: KalmanFilter.correct
(inherited documentation)

Instance Variable Details

stateUpdateFunction

Non-linear function to propagate state into the next timestep. The function is called with two arguments, the current Nx1 state vector and the current Mx1 control input vector. It should return a new Nx1 state vector. N and M are the numbers of states and control inputs.
Get Method:
unreachable.stateUpdateFunction(self)
Set Method:
unreachable.stateUpdateFunction(self, function)

measurementFunction

Non-linear function relating state variables to expected measurements. The function is called with the current Nx1 state vector as an argument, and should return an Mx1 measurement vector. N and M are the numbers of states and measurement outputs.
Get Method:
unreachable.measurementFunction(self)
Set Method:
